LinesAnswers.name: initial
LinesAnswers.line: Come here, sonny. I see you're one of ours, living beyond the Urals. I myself am a hunter, p-r-o-f-e-s-s-i-o-n-a-l one! Yep, that's how! I can shoot any animal so as not to ruin its hide, in the eye, for example, or anywhere else... But I'm not quite in shape now, we had a long conversation with mayor last night. Oh, my head. Do you have anything for a man with hangover?

responses.response: No, I don't drink myself and I don't advise you to.

LinesAnswers.name: initialWithAspirin
LinesAnswers.line: Come here, sonny. I see you're one of ours, living beyond the Urals. I myself am a hunter, p-r-o-f-e-s-s-i-o-n-a-l one! Yep, that's how! I can shoot any animal so as not to ruin its hide, in the eye, for example, or anywhere else... But I'm not quite in shape now, we had a long conversation with mayor last night. Oh, my head. Do you have anything for a man with hangover?

responses.response: You won't believe it, I have some pills for just such a case!
No, I don't drink myself and I don't advise you to.

LinesAnswers.name: asksForTeaNoTea
LinesAnswers.line: I have an idea, bring me some tea, it should cheer me up.

LinesAnswers.name: asksForTeaHasTea
LinesAnswers.line: I have an idea, bring me some tea, it should cheer me up.

responses.response: Here is your tea, I hope it is not too hot.
Here is your tea, I hope it is not too hot.

LinesAnswers.name: hunterWantsToGiveShuba
LinesAnswers.line: Yay, that's just what I need. Take this fur coat for the service.

LinesAnswers.name: hunterWantsToGiveShubaAfterAspirin
LinesAnswers.line: Thank you, compatriot, your help is worth a lot. Take this fur coat for your hard work.

LinesAnswers.name: hunterDrinksTeaOrGotAspirin
LinesAnswers.line: Ehhh! Stalinka - malinka, stalinka moja! mn-eh... or it was kalinka there...

responses.response: Khrushtshevka, maybe? Anyway, doesn't matter, have a rest!
